channel.title: 562 Client Stuck on "Connecting to update Server"
channel.description: Hey everyone i have "RuneSlay" source + client and all the .bats are working i have made a folder in my C: called "rscache" and placed the given cache from the "RuneSlay" client into it but as i run both bats and check them i try boot up my client and this is the problem the loading bar is stuck on about one tenth of the bar and on top it says "Connecting to the update server" I have reason to beleive this is my cache if not help will be repped!

item.title: 562 Client Stuck on "Connecting to update Server"
item.dc:creator: @maxpower maxpower
item.description:
@maxpower wrote:

Hey everyone i have “RuneSlay” source + client and all the .bats are working i have made a folder in my C: called “rscache” and placed the given cache from the “RuneSlay” client into it but as i run both bats and check them i try boot up my client and this is the problem the loading bar is stuck on about one tenth of the bar and on top it says “Connecting to the update server” I have reason to beleive this is my cache if not help will be repped!
